message.body: Looks like there are no purge English speakers but us in this study. Ha ha
Haha. A friend of mine was saying that she got paired with someone twice. I was like, really now? You still in the Dominican Republic?
No, i'm back! I turned my phone off for 7 days
Ah, I see. How was the trip? I'm sure it must be beautiful at this time of the year.
it was considered the rainy season but it really didn't rain all that much. Yes, it definitely was beautiful. We stayed in two different all inclusive resorts.
it was my first time getting the all-inclusive experience so I took full advantage of it, eating 3 full meals a day including dessert. And also participa
ting in all kinds of activities. now I gotta get my butt to the gym.
it really was beautiful crystal clear water. I went snorkeling, took wind surfing lessons, sailing lessons, even attended Trapez school
Trapeze that is...how was your holiday weekend?
(1/2)Pretty boring, actually. Had to meet deadlines, so needed to work. I went for a leisure drive, but that's it. I see you had an adventurous week. Must be
(2/2)such a drab feeling, going in to work... :P
Yeah, I didn't want to come home but I actually enjoy my jobs. Tonight I DJ a kid's pool party so that's kinda fun.
